title: My Muscles
description: Show those muscles! Which kind? In My Muscles, students learn about the three different types of muscles and how they help the body move in different ways. This book provides students with a clear explanation of how muscles work, and the delightful illustrations are informative and fun! This intriguing book is also great for teaching students how to compare and contrast and how to use the pronoun I.
